sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' export default function Home() { const [showName, setShowName] = useState("") const [input, setInput] = useState("") const [title, setTitle] = useState(null) const [plot, setPlot] = useState(null) const [poster, setPoster] = useState(null) const [released, setReleased] = useState(null) const [runtime, setRuntime] = useState(null) const [director, setDirector] = useState(null) const [genre, setGenre] = useState(null) const [writer, setWriter] = useState(null) const [actors, setActors] = useState(null) const [country, setCountry] = useState(null) const [imdbRating, setImdbRating] = useState(null) const [type, setType] =useState(null) const [year, setYear] = useState(null) const handleInput = (e) => { setInput(e.target.value) setShowName(e.target.value) } fetch(`http://www.omdbapi.com/?t=${showName}&apikey=3244219b`) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { console.log(data) setTitle(data.Title) setPlot(data.Plot) setPoster(data.Poster) setReleased(data.Released) setRuntime(data.Runtime) setDirector(data.Director) setGenre(data.Genre) setWriter(data.Writer) setActors(data.Actors) setCountry(data.Country) setImdbRating(data.imdbRating) setType(data.Type) setYear(data.Year) console.log("SHOW NAME: ", showName) }) return (

{title}

{year}

{input? <>

{title}

{type}

{released}

{runtime}

IMDB RATING: {imdbRating}

Your Rating

{genre}

Director: {director}

Writes: {writer}

Actors: {actors}

{plot}

Country: {country}

: null }
) }
